nycTheatreExcerpt: "But despite its very best intentions, the play is frustratingly surface level, rarely delving beyond Hallmark card sentiments about taking the good with the bad. At 100 minutes, the show hastily whips through a life's worth of milestones and minutiae, told mostly through verbose exposition delivered directly to the audience."
